name: NeuroNexus
description:
Escape from an abandoned space lab and decide the destiny of two prisoners.

This game was made for

Dungeon Crawlers Jam 2023

Keyboard controls:

W : one step further

S : one step back

A : strafe to the left

D : strafe to the right

Q : turn left

E : turn right

SPACE : wait (skip your turn)

1-5 : items

Game is turn based

Credits:

Music and programming: Alexander Polyakov

Game design and narrative: Nika Khudonogova

Art and narrative: minisiegfried (I’m sorryyyyy:))

Sounds from Soundly (https://getsoundly.com/), free library.
